text:
Hello,

Is it possible to have the blog listing page in your navigation and get the pageId and the featured image + metadescription from it?

I am doing this with the pageid for the other pages but the blog listing page appears to have an empty pageid. I am able to get the title and the href
Hi, I'm looking to have bi-directional sync between HubSpot and Google sheet. Any suggestion? Thank you in advance
Look for Marketplace App of Google Sheet

Hi <@U036VE8A3FD>,
1. You can connect Google Sheet app to your HubSpot or
2. You can just do it with API code, Please have a look <https://developers.google.com/apps-script|here>.

Not sure where to ask this question since it's not 100% development related? But essentially, I'm wondering _how_ HubSpot links a Renewal Deal to the Original Deal using Revenue Recognition (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/deals/track-recurring-revenue-with-revenue-analytics>). The context is what should we do if we need to create a renewal of a renewal and still use Revenue Recognition from the original deal?
thanks a lot bro, i made it this way before seeing  your messsage {{ rec_post.publish_date|datetimeformat('%B %e %Y')  }}
Yes but which you did its deprecated.
for real? it worked for me there
So HubSpot has form submission limits per contact?
What I recall is there is no such link. The original deal has an end date at which it does not contribute to MRR/ARR and the renewal deal contributes as of close date.

I am having one strange issue where I am submitting HubSpot form 2 times using same browser but with different data on each submission but HubSpot add the second submittion on same contact that created at first time of form submission. how to prevent that.

Check out the Options tab on your HubSpot form.
You need to decide on whether to enable or disable this option: _Always create contact for new email address_
